name: TACTICAL
description: TACTICAL is a challenging combination of puzzle and top-down shooter. You have one objective: eliminate all of the security robots. The catch is that you must not be discovered and only shots to the back will be effective.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU N3540 @ 2.16GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space
